results.title: Clinical experience with lisinopril. Observations on safety and tolerability.
results.text_hl: Fifty-three CHF @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@died@@@ (9.1%) and in three cases @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@ was considered to be related to @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy. @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@Hypotension@@@, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@orthostatic effects@@@ or @DISEASE_Dizziness @DISEASE_MESH:D004244 @@@dizziness@@@ following the initial dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ occurred infrequently (in 1.3% of the @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ group, including those receiving @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, and in 4.8% of CHF @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@).

results.title: Post-marketing surveillance of lisinopril in general practice in the UK.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Anemia_Hemolytic @DISEASE_MESH:D000743 @@@Anaemia@@@ was more often encountered on @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ treatment than on @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. In @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, the frequency of first-dose @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ was similar on both treatments.

results.title: Lisinopril: a new angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor.
results.text_hl: It is as effective as @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@. Combining @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ with @CHEMICAL_Hydrochlorothiazide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006852 @@@hydrochlorothiazide@@@ produces a greater degree of @<m>DISEASE_Hypotension</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@blood pressure reduction@@@.

citations.NLM: Chase SL, Sutton JD. Lisinopril: a new angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor. Pharmacotherapy. 1989;9(3):120-8; discussion 128-30. PMID: 2547199
